bc1652bd-937c-4820-bbd5-553aaf8884a9.name: 硬皮
bc1652bd-937c-4820-bbd5-553aaf8884a9.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

de01d43d-a63c-4d54-a8ef-1a3f52380ed1.name: 高痛阈
de01d43d-a63c-4d54-a8ef-1a3f52380ed1.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

f06e97d9-fb2e-4bf4-8a2f-d5bfff2c8b40.name: +10 points for every die of the robot’s thrust damage (minimum +2 points)

8ff11822-27c2-4a5e-a376-dc07e15c2eed.name: 易于命中
8ff11822-27c2-4a5e-a376-dc07e15c2eed.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

b9f88b54-21f9-479a-8398-cd209e430500.name: 视力不良（近视）
b9f88b54-21f9-479a-8398-cd209e430500.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

3d25203b-5e50-4cbf-94cb-b5b97a3d62d6.name: 氧气储存
3d25203b-5e50-4cbf-94cb-b5b97a3d62d6.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 25 倍

858bfc4f-54ad-4474-b514-9fe98c5e3d10.name: 氧气储存
858bfc4f-54ad-4474-b514-9fe98c5e3d10.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 50 倍

6a8b8c6f-d326-4b40-8d67-25ea348c2dc2.name: 氧气储存
6a8b8c6f-d326-4b40-8d67-25ea348c2dc2.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 100 倍

09864699-10a3-4f3f-983c-c35a6bd5c175.name: 氧气储存
09864699-10a3-4f3f-983c-c35a6bd5c175.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 200 倍

686fa624-e1ce-4c9d-b1f2-27dccaa8621d.name: 氧气储存
686fa624-e1ce-4c9d-b1f2-27dccaa8621d.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 300 倍

d180b77b-62f8-4eae-b34a-1ac9d110552e.name: 增强时间感
d180b77b-62f8-4eae-b34a-1ac9d110552e.notes: You immediately act in combat before those without Enhanced Time Sense; Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

ee82bd06-864e-4287-82ed-a9e266e8aad6.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

5f234a68-8723-44c7-af20-c8c1b223df78.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

6a7eabf1-e4eb-45be-bd20-390ff9d59f2b.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@
